file.title: Font family

p.text: It is the name of the font used for the object text (Arial, Time new roman, etc.).

p.textAll: All available fonts are specified in Quick fill words -> Font family.

sample.sampletitle: Variants of how button font can be set:
sample.samplecode: Window1.Button1.Font family = Arial Black Window1.Button1.Font family = "Time" & " new roman" Window1.Button1.Font family = Window1.Button2.Font family Window1.Button1.Font family = Window1.Text1.Text
